reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures are engaging and her lab sessions are well-organized.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant teacher who makes complex algorithms understandable. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting material, but assignments can be unclear at times.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Johnson is always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's passion for chemistry is contagious. Her experiments are fascinating!

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are often dry and the workload is excessive.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions and relevant case studies. Very insightful.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes struggles to explain complex concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's analysis of classic works is outstanding. She encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Practical approach to economics with real-world examples. Challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Field trips to museums greatly enhance the learning experience.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting course content, but Prof. Green can sometimes appear biased in discussions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and relevant field work. Dr. Martinez is clearly dedicated to her field.

reviews.subject: Electrical Engineering
reviews.review: Excellent at explaining complex circuits. Lab sessions are particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Challenges students to think critically. Discussions can be intense but enlightening.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Good theoretical knowledge, but could use more practical, up-to-date examples.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Cutting-edge research incorporated into lectures. Dr. Nguyen is an inspiring educator.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Patient teacher who breaks down complex musical concepts effectively.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Excellent at explaining complex genetic principles. Lab work is particularly enlightening.

reviews.subject: Architecture
reviews.review: Knowledgeable about architectural history, but project feedback could be more constructive.
